alert.note: Alert for George; Perry; Stone (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 09 at 12:15AM CST until February 09 at 1:00AM CST by NWS Mobile
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Western George County in southeastern Mississippi... Southern Perry County in southeastern Mississippi... Stone County in southeastern Mississippi... * Until 100 AM CST. * At 1214 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles west of Wiggins to 5 miles west of Perkinston to 8 miles west of McHenry, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wiggins, Perkinston and McHenry. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
